page.title: 13Silver Jubilee (Cont)
page.content: The date was the 5th July 1985. Now it was the children's turn to celebrate Father McDonald's Silver Jubilee. We were admiring each other's clothing, feeling glad we could wear our best clothes, not our school uniform. The Mass had been prepared by the children, and every class participated. At the end, the Head Girl, Rosemary Howarth and the Head Boy, Damian Jack, on behalf of the children, presented Father McDonald with a spritual bouquet and a piece of Tyrone crystal. The crystal had a picture of Jesus and some children etched onto it. The money for the presents has been raised in various ways. Two cake sales, a toy fair and a junior disco between them raised the Â£250 needed.
